body:
Patches openblas_icc_fortran.patch and openblas_icc_fortran2.patch are rejected with openblas 0.3.15 while it compiles smoothly without the patch.
Just a notice, I have not managed to compile 0.3.14 with any Intel compiler (Intel 17, 20 and 2021.2).
title: openblas: compile 0.3.15 with Intel
